titleStmt.title: Family-prayers for every day in the week Containing a short summary of Christian religion. By Theophilus Dorrington.
titleStmt.author: Dorrington, Theophilus, d. 1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Wyat at the Rose in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Wing D1941B, which has "Wayt" in the imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.

place.placeName: the Rose in St. Paul's Church-yard
